newsitem.title: USA: Sioux Falls cattle up $.50 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Sioux Falls cattle up $.50 - USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers moderately active. Both classes $0.50 higher than last Wednesday.-USDA

Slaughter Steers - 2 Loads Choice end Prime predominantly 3, old-crop 1331 lbs 70.00. High Select and Choice 2-3, 1200-1350 lbs 67.50- 68.50. Select and Choice 2-3, 1100-1300 lbs 66.50-67.50. Select 1-2 64.00-66.50.
Slaughter Heifers - High Select and Choice 2-3, 1050-1250 lbs scarce. Select and Choice 2-3, 950-1100 lbs 64.50-67.00. Select 1-2, 63.50-64.50.
